thread.title: EagleRider Invites All To Celebrate 2015 Sturgis Motorcycle Rally And Founder Chris McIntyre's Induction Into The Hall Of Fame!
thread.title_full: EagleRider Invites All To Celebrate 2015 Sturgis Motorcycle Rally And Founder Chris McIntyre's Induction Into The Hall Of Fame!

title: EagleRider Invites All To Celebrate 2015 Sturgis Motorcycle Rally And Founder Chris McIntyre's Induction Into The Hall Of Fame!
text: Best High-Yielders EagleRider Invites All To Celebrate 2015 Sturgis Motorcycle Rally And Founder Chris McIntyre's Induction Into The Hall Of Fame! By PR Newswire | 07/08/15 - 05:52 PM EDT Reprint LOS ANGELES , July 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- That time of the year has arrived once again for people all around the world to come together in one of the biggest forums for motorcycling passion in the world today; the 75th Annual Sturgis Motorcycle Rally is upon us and EagleRider has prepared a massive fleet of vehicles as well as all the staff in our supporting locations to provide both the veterans and newcomers of Sturgis with the dream experience they expect. Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150708/234137LOGO Just a short glance at the Sturgis event calendar for the week of August 2nd reveals an extraordinary variety of almost 80 events taking place day after day. No matter who you are or what your idea of a good time is, the way Sturgis delivers will show you why this rally has achieved Legendary status in riding circles and beyond. While you're there, be sure to pop by an EagleRider booth and enter in our special drawing to win one of three incredible vacations : our Guided Baja Peninsula, Mexican South Bound Tour ($2576 value) , a 7 day Motorcycle Rental Experience ( $903 value), and our Endless Summer Las Vegas 4 Day Getaway Self Drive Tour ($455 value) . Our booths can be found downtown at Lazelle and Main, the Buffalo Chip Crossroads, and the Buffalo Chip Amphitheater. Aside from the concerts, competitions, and all manner of unforgettable entertainment, Sturgis is a place where motorcycling history is made. The 2015 rally is of special significance to EagleRider as it will see our very own Founder and CEO Chris McIntyre inducted into the Sturgis Motorcycle Hall of Fame—one of the very highest honors to be awarded in the field. When asked about the upcoming induction, McIntyre paused for a moment before saying "I've devoted my life to serving the world of Motorcycling...all my fellow brothers and sisters who share this passion we have for the motorcycle and the rich history, culture, and tradition behind it. You can imagine how gratifying it is — after all these years — to have the community acknowledge that EagleRider has made a positive difference in our world. We talk a lot here about making our client's dreams come true... August 5th will be a dream come true for me." Ride With Us to Sturgis! ABOUT EAGLERIDER Pioneering the motorcycle rental concept in 1992, EagleRider has since extended its branches to become a motorcycle experience industry giant offering services of all kinds to assist and empower motorcyclists and travelers worldwide. Whether you simply would like to try out the motorcycle of your dreams or go on a great adventure in the self-drive and guided tours offered from any one of our beautifully located 100+ locations across the globe, EagleRider offers the world's favorite brands including Harley-Davidson®, Indian®, Honda® and BMW® in motorcycles as well as Scooters, Dirt Bikes, and ATV's. We also provide motorcycle service, parts, and accessories in addition to a vast array of solutions for individuals as well as dealers that are looking to buy and/or sell their bikes. For more information on rentals and tours, please visit www.EagleRider.com . If you are interested in buying and/or selling a bike, visit www.UsedMotorcycles.net . Our inventory of parts and accessories can be found at Store.EagleRider.com .
